name: Kselebox
summary: Kselebox is a sandbox game, which means you can do whatever you want in it! You can build a rocket and go to explore the vastness of space. Or maybe you want to build a huge car? No problem! Players can save their buildings and then publish them to the Steam Workshop.

name: KSI Unleashed
summary: KSI Unleashed was an action mobile game made by Good Catch Games based on British YouTuber KSI.

name: Ks Tank War
summary: 3D tank first-person shooting, you can also switch perspectives. Language Supports English, Japanese and Chinese. A mouse and keyboard are required to control. A single-player PC game with 9 levels. Non-network game.

name: KSame
summary: KDE Linux version of SameGame credited with popularizing SameGame in the west. Spawned many imitators.

name: KSudoku
summary: KSudoku is a free version of the popular logic game Sudoku developed by the KDE community. The game is to fill a nine by nine grid with the numbers from one to nine filling the rows, columns and three by three squares without repeating a value on them.

name: K.S.-n-Kickin
summary:
K.S.-n-Kickin is a 3D action puzzle video game made by Artworld UK and Big Future Ltd. for Kinder Surprise, with music licensed from Telstar Records. It was released for Microsoft Windows. The game was a promotion by Ferrero to "strengthen their foothold in the younger age group market". The game features Kinder Surprise toys from the K00 series.

The game was not sold in stores, but was offered in exchange for Kinder Egg wrappers which were sent to Ferrero. The promotion was advertised via TV commercials. K.S.-n-Kickin has the same map layout and soundtrack as Gubble 2 (part of the Gubble video game series), but has different backgrounds, characters, and items.

name: Ksiega Dzungli
summary: The Jungle Book is a game that depicts the story of a boy raised by wolves in the Indian jungle. The whole gives the child a chance to get to know various wild animals, including by taking pictures of them, or showing off their dexterity in saving small wolves. In addition, our Ms. people test their strategic abilities during the “Old Expeditions after the Red AFlow,” pass through the Dark Labyrinths and learn the mystery of Kaa’s Serpent.

name: K-Shoot Mania
summary: K-Shoot MANIA is a simulation program for a rhythm game called "Sound Voltex". The goal is to hit keys and effect buttons and turn knobs to the rhythm of the music.

name: K Station
summary:
K Station is an old-school adventure game, and is the first game from the indie studio Maya Games.

The goal is to make it off K Station. To do so, you'll have to interact with the world and the other characters inhabiting the station. All interactions are done by using the keyboard, you'll type commands for each interaction, for example: "talk to meena" and "look at bed".

name: K-Star Patrol
summary: Fly right and shoot straight to defend your fleet from enemy attackers.
